quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
You cannot have a better tomorrow if you are thinking about yesterday all the time.
I never lose. I either win or learn.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People: 1) Be proactive, 2) Begin with the end in mind, 3) Put first things first, 4) Think win-win, 5) Seek first to understand, then to be understood, 6) Synergize, 7) Sharpen the saw.
Success is nothing more than a few simple habits practiced every day.
A habit is nothing but our memory of a routine.
Success is 1% inspiration and 99% perspiration.
Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always gotten. If you want something different, do something different.
If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
Creativity is intelligence having fun.
What we think, we become. All that we are arises with our thoughts. With our thoughts, we make the world.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
You can have it all. Just not all at once.
Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
Don't count the days, make the days count.
